message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I was hoping to keep my spending within $80 for this product. Would it be possible for us to negotiate down to $85?
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your budget, but I can't go as low as $85. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $90?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Unfortunately, I am still not able to meet at $90. Would you consider $88 as a compromise?
